mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Eight Chain Star", "Half and Half", and "Hillbilly Fever". ROUND DANCES "Champagne Time" and "Tonight's The Night". SPECIAL FEATURES "1958 By Lloyd Shaw", "What's Being Danced?", "Member in Good Standing", "How Long, How Many?", "Square Dancing Around the World", "Caller Round Up", "Kentucky "Spurred" By National Convention", "Don't Forget...! Next Month is Asilomar", "Forward of Back?", "California Associations, Part III". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "From the Floor", "As I See It", "Chuck Jones' Notebook", "Style Series: More on the Trail Through", "Square Dance Picture", "Paging the Roundancers (Earl and Ouida Eberling)", "Square of the Month (Bob Bevan)", "Roung the Outside Ring", and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
